foreverID is an innovative and game-changing solution for our connected world.

When using this Chrome Extension, you can add the contact details of foreverID subscribers in an instant into your Google Contacts or Microsoft Outlook Web Contacts folder.

Once their contact details are added, your contacts folder will always be updated with any changes they make to their details.  The foreverID cloud will do all the work and keep your digital address books up to date, forever!

If you don't have foreverID, get it now.  A Basic User subscription is FREE so sign up today to explore a whole new world of networking â€“ better, faster, and smarter.

https://foreverid.com

Happy networking!
